roleset.name: Natural Disaster: rockslide

example.text: In April 1974 a gigantic and fast rockslide with a volume estimated at 1 to 1.3Ö¼109 m3 dammed the Mantaro river in the Peruvian Andes, causing more than 450 casualties and forming a 130 m to 150 m high dam [16, 17].

roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to avalanche, mudslide, landslide, lahar.
